detail_desc: Fully lined, printed swimsuit with small frills at the side of the hems.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Ankle-length cargo trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with buttons.
Short, fitted skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable belt and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Short, fitted skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable belt and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft, chunky jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed, rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long cardigan knitted in soft bouclé yarn containing some wool. Long sleeves and no buttons.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with gathers around the neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long raglan sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs.
Bralette in soft satin with a sweetheart neckline, wide shoulder straps, smocking at the back and a zip at the front with a tab decorated with sparkly stones.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and a seam with a drawstring under the bust that is elasticated at the back. Long sleeves and narrow cuffs with a button. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather. High paper bag waist with wide, covered elastic and a short frill trim at the top. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem. Unlined.

Boxy, oversized jacket in cotton denim with a collar, metal buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a metal button and side pockets. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
High-waisted skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button and front and back pockets. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
High-waisted skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button and front and back pockets. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.

Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and flap leg pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and flap leg pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and flap leg pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and dropped shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with ribbing and decorative, pearly buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and dropped shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with ribbing and decorative, pearly buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.
Straight-cut coat in pile with notch lapels, press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Lined.

Joggers in soft, lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication, a small frill trim and decorative drawstring at the waist. Small embroidery detail in glittery thread at the top, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Joggers in soft, lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication, a small frill trim and decorative drawstring at the waist. Small embroidery detail in glittery thread at the top, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Set with a vest top and matching shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.

Set with a vest top and matching shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.

Set with a vest top and matching shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Size 4 cm.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Size 4 cm.
Leggings in stretch imitation leather with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Slim legs with visible seams front and back and raw-edge hems.
Short, gently fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.

Playsuit in washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed zip at the front and yoke at the back. Two chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a seam and sewn-on tie belt at the waist.
Playsuit in washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed zip at the front and yoke at the back. Two chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a seam and sewn-on tie belt at the waist.

Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with adjustable frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Open section at the back with ties, a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Strapless balconette bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Side support and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué at the front.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué at the front.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué at the front.
Short, flared skirt in plumeti chiffon with a jersey lining. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim.

Set with a polo shirt, shorts and pre-tied bow tie. Short-sleeved top in patterned cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with a decorative button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Pre-tied bow tie in cotton jersey with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.

Double-breasted, ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and diagonal side pockets. Seam at the waist, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with wide shoulder straps and offset buttons down the front. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey, one in pointelle. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, short puff sleeves and short legs. Picot trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems. Front pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and decorative pocket flaps at the back.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Thong body in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and a push-up bra with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Opening and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and an opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with seams. Lined.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and an opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with seams. Lined.
Briefs in soft microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Short top in a fine, textured knit with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
Short top in a fine, textured knit with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
Short top in a fine, textured knit with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
Short top in a fine, textured knit with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front and long trumpet sleeves.

Classic oversized shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
